summary: Fifth-generation (5G) wireless promises not just to increase speeds but to enable new applications like automated cars and smart factories. We reviewed U.S. 5G development. It's still early, with efforts focusing on increasing speed and connecting more devices. Technologies that enable 5G's full potential are expected within the next decade. We also highlight key challenges to 5G and present policy options to address them. For...
title: 5G Wireless: Capabilities and Challenges for an Evolving Network
